
%
% Allows LaTeX to place table (h)ere, (t)op of page, or (b)ottom of page.
% Three (l)eft-aligned colums (use r for right-aligned, c for centered).
% Vertical lines between colums.
%

\begin{table}[htb]
	\centering
    \begin{tabular}{| l | l | l |}
		\hline
		First column & Second column & Third column \\
		\hline \hline
		some text		& more text		& bla bla \\
		another cell	& bla bla ...	& and some more text.. \\
		\hline
    \end{tabular}
  \caption{A simple table}
\end{table}
